sys_ux_client_script.name: stylized_text_260/text

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_8b6c25011b6c8250dba1c3e5464bcba0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Product Performance default">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>stylized_text_260/text</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  // */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  var KPI_bds_list = api.data.verticalA_headlinemetric2v.output.result;

  const selection_arr = [api.state.tab3PISElement, api.state.tab3PortfolioElement];
  var dropdown_selection = selection_arr.find(el => el !== '');

  if (api.state.tab3PISBreakdown != ''){   
    for(let i = 0; i < KPI_bds_list.length; i++) {
      var KPI_bd_sysid = KPI_bds_list[i].element_level2.value;
      if (dropdown_selection === KPI_bd_sysid) {
        var KPI_bd_changeperc = KPI_bds_list[i].changeperc_formatted;
        return KPI_bd_changeperc;
        break;
      }
    }
  } else {
      return KPI_bds_list[0].changeperc_formatted;
  }
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-22 11:26:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8b6c25011b6c8250dba1c3e5464bcba0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_260/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8b6c25011b6c8250dba1c3e5464bcba0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-04 09:57:36</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>18dd093a3a40000001</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8b6c25011b6c8250dba1c3e5464bcba0</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-22 11:29:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>fbfce9091b6c8250dba1c3e5464bcb2b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-22 11:29:13</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
